work_experiences.description: Created and deployed this website on VPS. Leaned a lot about Linux, Bash Scripting, Services, Databases, Containers with plenty of hands on experience in the topics and there are more to come.
Helped running Ukraine Community Centre Rathmines dealing with customers.

education.degree: Honours Bachelor Degree of Computer Science
education.details: Expected to graduate in May 2027 with a first class honours degree.
Did 3 of 4 years and left to do advanced entry to Trinity College.
